actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Act of June 23, 1936, to authorize the Secretary of Interior to exchange lands.

summary.text: Repeals provisions granting to the city of Los Angeles, California, lands in Mono County, California, for designated uses. Preserves to such city all rights to operate, maintain, and repair existing rights-of-way and facilities established pursuant to such grant. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all interest of the United States in specified lands to the city of Los Angeles upon conveyance by such city of all its interest, excepting water and water rights, in other specified lands to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Act of June 23, 1936, to authorize the Secretary of Interior to exchange lands.
